segments.text: Excuse me . Does this bus go by Tiananmen square ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At which stop should I get off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a stop at Tiananmen Square . The stops will be announced on the bus both in English and Chinese . When the stop is coming , you just push the red button near the rear door if you want to get off .
segments.speaker: S2
